metadata.name: #01 // Genesis
metadata.description:
I created this collection as a »Thank You!« to my earliest and biggest collectors. I appreciate all of you support! Without these guys, 21/22 could have been a pretty difficult time. So thank you again!

This one is actually the original artwork, that all the other ones are based on. I created the main drawing around 2016 for a client. Years later I revisited the drawing and added some colors. The final version was created in 2023.
